pkgmetadata.longdescription: High Dimensional Discriminant Analysis with Compositional Data // High dimensional discriminant analysis with compositional data is performed. The compositional data are first transformed using the alpha-transformation of Tsagris M., Preston S. and Wood A.T.A. (2011) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1106.1451, and then the High Dimensional Discriminant Analysis (HDDA) algorithm of Bouveyron C. Girard S. and Schmid C. (2007) doi:10.1080/03610920701271095 is applied.
